results.content: Being new I to slim and frameworks, I had difficulty following the directory structure.  The author appears to be creating or using a folder named 'workspace' under 'slim', but that wasn't spelled out for us dummies.
results.content_html: Being new I to slim and frameworks, I had difficulty following the directory structure. The author appears to be creating or using a folder named 'workspace' under 'slim', but that wasn't spelled out for us dummies.

results.content:
Very informative. For beginner with slim is this course little bit to fast and i wished more background informations about middleware, di, configuration of slim etc ... The Screen is difficult to read on my laptop.

Good job!

results.content: This is a very good introduction to SLIM, I think this one would serve you well if you are just starting out with SLIM, and you are not at the level of diving into a long, complex and advanced app, this makes a very good starter
results.content_html: This is a very good introduction to SLIM, I think this one would serve you well if you are just starting out with SLIM, and you are not at the level of diving into a long, complex and advanced app, this makes a very good starter

results.content:
Slim is my favorite framework but the community is not very active and it can be difficult to see how others are using it. I was hoping the course projects would be more complex, but Chris' use of slim-http and mustache templating were something I had not seen in action before.

I wish he would use a larger font in his IDE - reading the code can be challenging even with the enlarged key logger at the bottom of the screen.
results.content_html:
Slim is my favorite framework but the community is not very active and it can be difficult to see how others are using it. I was hoping the course projects would be more complex, but Chris' use of slim-http and mustache templating were something I had not seen in action before.

I wish he would use a larger font in his IDE - reading the code can be challenging even with the enlarged key logger at the bottom of the screen.

results.content:
Really enjoying the course so far! I'd been looking to learn more about Slim for a while so it's wonderful to find there's now a course on Udemy. Great instruction and great content! 
The only reason I haven't given the course 5 stars is that it can be very difficult to read the code at the size it is. Even on a big monitor, because there's no 1080p option, some syntax is illegible. If the instructor had made the editor window full-screen and upped the font-size size a fair bit, this would have gotten a perfect score.
Still, thanks very much for an excellent course! :)
results.content_html:
